channel.title: How to add item...?
channel.description: hello i would know how can i had item on my server because when i talk to the mage of zammy he tele me to altar but there is no altar there is nothing i want to had one.... i need your help fast plz

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I honestly do fully agree with Ashton, just wanted to point out that his English is horrible to start with, so you can’t expect too much.

p.s. Just now realizing how many “hows” I had in that sentence lol.

item.title: How to add item...?
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:30, topic:387230”]I do understand how you grammar folks feel about how a person represents themselves through how they talk on the internet, and there is absolutely nothing wrong with that.

Just for the record though, Cradle is French and hasn’t had much English training.[/quote]
Proper grammar is important for someone who needs help, Its like programming. If you use shit conventions and make your code sloppy then its impossible for other programmers to read, understand, and modify it.

When you use bad grammar, It’s hard for us to decipher it and try to understand exactly what the OP is asking. Common spelling errors and typos are understood but compare the phraseology of the two statements and you tell me which person you would rather help
“Hello, I need some help with the npc drops in my server, I don’t know how to make a npc drop something 100% Can anyone help me?”

Or

“hi i need sum1 tell me fast how i add drops in my server and how i mke it drop whn i wnt and all the time”

Read full topic

item.title: How to add item...?
item.dc:creator: @Epic_Steve Epic Steve
item.description:
@Epic_Steve wrote:

It’s people like these that make Moparscape a retarded place.

I think the spelling and grammar is getting worse on here. I mean I’m the first to admit that everyone makes mistakes and mine isn’t the best, but seriously, this takes the piss.

“hello i would know how can i had item on my server because when i talk to the mage of zammy he tele me to altar but there is no altar there is nothing i want to had one… i need your help fast plz”

First of all, you can’t “had” an item. It makes no fucking sense what so ever. Secondly, “i would know how”, what? Thirdly, you don’t need our help fast, you would like it.

I really, really, hope English is not your first language, if it’s not, then maybe I’ll let you off a little bit, but you should still learn to use English words in the proper context.

Read full topic
